entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:18 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -36.7°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 38.
